content: sc1 dc4 hdc1 sc5 sc1 increase x4 dc6 hdc1 sc3 sc2in1 sc1 sc2in1 row 4 dc2in1 dc2 dc2in1 sc1 sc1 *with double_crochet and half_double_crochet i was trying to get some irregular edges spots 6 and 7 these are the most difficult ones ch11 start from the second chain from the hook row 1 sc2in1 sc4 sc3in1 sc3 sc2in1 on the other side of the hook sc2in1 sc2 sc3tog sc3 sc2in1 row 2 sc2in1 x2 sc4 sc2in1 sc2 x2 sc2in1 x4 sc2 sc3tog sc1 sc2in1 x2 row 3 sc1 sc2in1 x2 hdc1 dc4 hdc1 sc1 sc2in1 x2 sc1 hdc1 dc1 dc2in1 hdc1 sc2in1 sc1 sc2in1 sc2 decrease sc1 hdc1 decrease dc1 x2 row 4 dc1 hdc1 sc2in1 sc1 hdc1 dc1 decrease hdc1 sc2 decrease dc3 sc2in1 sc6 sc2 sc2in1 x3 sc1 sc3tog sc2 dc2 dc2in1 sc1 now you need to sew everything together attach ears more / less at the eyes line stuff the nose when there is only small hole left when you sew attach spots wherever you like it s a cow so they can be somewhere different each time  weave in all the ends and cut the remaining tails of yarn and voila you have your own baby cow ^_^ daddy cow materials crochet hook size 3 5mm yarn used himalaya everyday color black 100g/250m himalaya everyday bebe lux cream color number 70437 100g/250m himalaya everyday color brown ish color number 70055 100g/250m 2 balls himalaya everyday bebe lux color light brown the one horns are crocheted color number 70414 100g/250m if you use other kind of yarn and hook size you ll just get different size of the toy my finished work is over 30cm tall black thread for nose and eyebrows if you want to make them safety eyes or buttons some toy or pillow stuffing *work in continuous rounds the sewing is same as with baby cow so i m not posting the same pictures just the pattern crochet everything in brown color i ll make a note when the color should be different head stuff when you start decreasing eyes are going around the middle of the head - somewhere between row 16 and 18 row 1 sc6 in magic_ring row 2 sc2in1 around 12sts row 3 sc1 increase around 18 row 4 sc2 increase around 24 row 5 sc3 increase around 30 row 6 sc4 increase around 36 row 7 sc5 increase around 42 row 8 sc6 increase around 48 row 9 sc7 increase around 54 row 10 sc8 increase around 60 row 11 sc9 increase around 66 row 12 sc10 increase around 72 row 13 sc11 increase around 78 row 14 29 sc78 16 row row 30 sc11 decrease around 72 row 31 sc10 decrease around 66 row 32 sc9 decrease around 60 row 33 sc8 decrease around 54 row 34 sc7 decrease around 48 row 35 sc6 decrease around 42 row 36 sc5 decrease around 36 row 37 sc4 decrease around 30 slip_stitch fasten_off leave a tail body stuff when
